The surge, triggered around 1:50 pm, reduced the bustling marketplace to rubble in seconds. Newspaper clippings from 1971 show Pakistan's military buildup. They also highlight unrest in then-East Pakistan. The US backed Pakistan during the war. This reminder follows India's rejection of US criticism over energy trade with Russia. Tensions between India and Pakistan are currently high after a terror attack.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/another-pak-diplomat-quits-army-recalls-1971-war-build-up-highlights-it-in-this-day-that-year-post/articleshow/123135859.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/another-pak-diplomat-quits-army-recalls-1971-war-build-up-highlights-it-in-this-day-that-year-post/articleshow/123135859.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:27:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="804492" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135886,imgsize-804492.cms"/></item><item><title>Kartavya Bhawan inaugurated; key things to know about high-tech building</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated Kartavya Bhavan, the first building under the Common Central Secretariat project, designed to consolidate government offices for enhanced efficiency. Post-match, Brett Lee connected with fans, sharing a wholesome moment with a young Sikh supporter. South Africa Champions ultimately won the tournament, defeating Pakistan Champions in the final.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/watch-brett-lee-wins-hearts-by-folding-hands-saying-sat-sri-akaal-to-young-sikh-fan/articleshow/123138131.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/watch-brett-lee-wins-hearts-by-folding-hands-saying-sat-sri-akaal-to-young-sikh-fan/articleshow/123138131.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:13:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44332" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123138490,imgsize-44332.cms"/></item><item><title>Fake cops, crypto trail: All you need to know about Rs 260cr global cyber fraud</title><description><![CDATA[The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has launched an investigation into a Rs 260 crore global cyber fraud, conducting searches across multiple cities. Fraudsters impersonated law enforcement and tech support to extort money from victims. The illicit funds were converted into cryptocurrency, then laundered through hawala channels and individuals in the UAE.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/fake-cops-money-laundering-via-crypto-ed-raids-11-locations-all-you-need-to-know-about-rs-260cr-global-cyber-fraud/articleshow/123133744.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/fake-cops-money-laundering-via-crypto-ed-raids-11-locations-all-you-need-to-know-about-rs-260cr-global-cyber-fraud/articleshow/123133744.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:17:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="793383" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134246,imgsize-793383.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia posts a long message for China with an appeal to the US govt, says: There is no such thing as good …</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia addresses concerns about its H20 AI chips in China. The company denies any backdoors or security risks. Nvidia's chief security officer, David Reber, assures that the chips are secure. Nvidia also pushes back against proposals for mandatory kill switches in chips. They argue such measures would harm trust and create vulnerabilities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-posts-a-long-message-for-china-with-an-appeal-to-the-us-government-says-there-is-no-such-thing-as-good-/articleshow/123135980.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-posts-a-long-message-for-china-with-an-appeal-to-the-us-government-says-there-is-no-such-thing-as-good-/articleshow/123135980.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:26:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="112994" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135973,imgsize-112994.cms"/></item><item><title>Sachin breaks silence on handshake drama, asks 'Why should bowlers be kept fresh?'</title><description><![CDATA[The Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy concluded in a 2-2 draw, marked by the controversial handshake refusal by Jadeja and Sundar in the fourth Test. Sachin Tendulkar has strongly defended the Indian team's decision, emphasising the strategic advantage of tiring out England's bowlers before the crucial fifth Test. He lauded Sundar's adaptability and reiterated his full support for the team's approach.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sachin-tendulkar-breaks-silence-on-handshake-controversy-asks-why-should-englands-bowlers-be-kept-fresh/articleshow/123137433.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-sachin-tendulkar-breaks-silence-on-handshake-controversy-asks-why-should-englands-bowlers-be-kept-fresh/articleshow/123137433.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 13:21:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61088" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137616,imgsize-61088.cms"/></item><item><title>If India cuts Russian crude under US pressure, will inflation rise? RBI guv responds</title><description><![CDATA[RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra downplayed fears of significant inflation from reduced Russian oil imports, citing diversified sources and potential government fiscal measures. His remarks come amid US tariff threats over India's Russian oil purchases, which India has rejected. Despite geopolitical tensions, the RBI held its repo rate steady, forecasting stable growth and controlled inflation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tariff-war-as-trump-pressures-india-to-cut-russian-oil-will-inflation-rise-if-crude-stops-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-explains/articleshow/123137675.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tariff-war-as-trump-pressures-india-to-cut-russian-oil-will-inflation-rise-if-crude-stops-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-explains/articleshow/123137675.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 13:29:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123137776,imgsize-65262.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE mandates 75% attendance for board exam eligibility: Rule effective from 2026; key details</title><description><![CDATA[The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) has mandated 75% minimum attendance for Class 10 and 12 students in the 2025–26 session to qualify for the 2026 board exams. Strict exemptions, surprise inspections, and zero tolerance for manipulated records underscore the board’s renewed push to curb dummy candidates and enforce academic discipline across affiliated schools.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-mandates-75-attendance-for-board-exam-eligibility-in-2026-check-details-here/articleshow/123136880.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-mandates-75-attendance-for-board-exam-eligibility-in-2026-check-details-here/articleshow/123136880.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:47:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="539444" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123136870,imgsize-539444.cms"/></item><item><title>Angry at Mira Murati for refusing $1bn offer, Zuckerberg launched 'full-scale raid'</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, reportedly attempted to acquire Mira Murati's startup, Thinking Machines Lab, with a $1 billion offer. After Murati declined, Zuckerberg allegedly launched a recruitment drive targeting its employees, including Andrew Tulloch, offering a potential $1.5 billion pay package.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:30:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121185,imgsize-44662.cms"/></item><item><title>Harry Brook disagrees with Gautam Gambhir: 'Didn’t score as many runs ...'</title><description><![CDATA[Harry Brook, despite being named Player of the Series by Gautam Gambhir, believed Joe Root was more deserving due to his consistent performance throughout the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series. Brook acknowledged Root's higher run tally and overall impact, highlighting his teammate's enduring class. The series concluded in a 2-2 draw, showcasing a thrilling battle between England and India.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-harry-brook-disagrees-with-gautam-gambhir-says-didnt-score-as-many-runs-/articleshow/123138729.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-harry-brook-disagrees-with-gautam-gambhir-says-didnt-score-as-many-runs-/articleshow/123138729.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:26:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55888" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123138841,imgsize-55888.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump was asked about India’s claim on US importing Russian uranium, fertilisers; his response</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst criticism over India's Russian oil purchases, US President Donald Trump claimed ignorance about the US importing fertilizers and chemicals from Russia. He accused India of profiting from reselling Russian oil and threatened tariff hikes, prompting a strong rebuttal from India, which cited strategic necessity and questioned the hypocrisy of Western nations continuing their trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-trump-was-asked-about-indias-claim-on-us-importing-russian-uranium-fertilisers-heres-his-response/articleshow/123131430.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/trade-war-trump-was-asked-about-indias-claim-on-us-importing-russian-uranium-fertilisers-heres-his-response/articleshow/123131430.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:38:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31346" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131560,imgsize-31346.cms"/></item><item><title>NSDL IPO listing: Company shares list 15% higher than issue price of Rs 800</title><description><![CDATA[NSDL shares debuted strongly on Wednesday, listing at a 15% premium over the issue price of Rs 800, reaching Rs 920 and a market valuation of Rs 18,249 crore. The Rs 4,011 crore IPO was oversubscribed 41 times.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/nsdl-ipo-listing-today-company-makes-strong-debut-shares-list-15-higher-than-issue-price-of-rs-800/articleshow/123134655.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/nsdl-ipo-listing-today-company-makes-strong-debut-shares-list-15-higher-than-issue-price-of-rs-800/articleshow/123134655.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:37:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="16286" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135377,imgsize-16286.cms"/></item><item><title>Perplexity under fire: Cloudflare says AI bots faked identities to bypass site blocks</title><description><![CDATA[Perplexity, an AI search startup, faces allegations from Cloudflare of using deceptive tactics to bypass website restrictions. Cloudflare claims Perplexity's bots disguised themselves as regular users to scrape content from blocked domains, raising concerns about unauthorized data usage. Perplexity denies wrongdoing, attributing the activity to third-party traffic and user-driven requests.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/perplexity-under-fire-cloudflare-says-perplexitys-ai-bots-faked-their-identities-to-bypass-site-blocks/articleshow/123136676.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/perplexity-under-fire-cloudflare-says-perplexitys-ai-bots-faked-their-identities-to-bypass-site-blocks/articleshow/123136676.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:48:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="10342" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123136800,imgsize-10342.cms"/></item><item><title>'Don't burn him out': Ex-India pacer sounds alarm, says Siraj is in Bumrah's league</title><description><![CDATA[Following Mohammed Siraj's impressive performance in England, RP Singh cautioned against overworking him, emphasising the need for careful workload management akin to Jasprit Bumrah to prevent potential burnout. Singh highlighted Siraj's indispensable role and partnership with Bumrah, advocating for strategic team selections and like-for-like injury substitutions to maintain team balance and player well-being.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/dont-burn-him-out-rp-singh-sounds-alarm-says-mohammed-siraj-is-in-jasprit-bumrahs-league/articleshow/123135279.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/dont-burn-him-out-rp-singh-sounds-alarm-says-mohammed-siraj-is-in-jasprit-bumrahs-league/articleshow/123135279.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:01:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57012" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135362,imgsize-57012.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump's tariff threat on India: What RBI guv Sanjay Malhotra said on GDP growth</title><description><![CDATA[RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra acknowledges the difficulty in predicting the impact of potential US tariffs on India's GDP growth. While the central bank retained its 6.5% GDP forecast for fiscal year 2025-26 and kept the repo rate unchanged, Malhotra emphasized ongoing global uncertainties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-higher-tariff-threat-on-india-what-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-said-on-gdp-growth-really-very-difficult-to-/articleshow/123135823.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trumps-higher-tariff-threat-on-india-what-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-said-on-gdp-growth-really-very-difficult-to-/articleshow/123135823.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:23:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60098" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135856,imgsize-60098.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump, Gretzky and Tkachuk to revive youth Presidential Fitness Test</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's President's Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition includes Wayne Gretzky and Matthew Tkachuk. The Council will focus on fitness in schools. It aims to restore college athletic customs and protect women's sports. Matthew Tkachuk impressed the White House during the Florida Panthers' visit. He will help shape fitness programs for kids.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/matthew-tkachuk-and-wayne-gretzky-team-up-with-donald-trump-to-revive-iconic-presidential-fitness-test-for-youth/articleshow/123104387.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/matthew-tkachuk-and-wayne-gretzky-team-up-with-donald-trump-to-revive-iconic-presidential-fitness-test-for-youth/articleshow/123104387.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 03:12:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1422022" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123104383,imgsize-1422022.cms"/></item><item><title>Mohali blast: 2 killed, three injured in explosion at oxygen cylinder plant</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mohali-blast-2-killed-three-injured-in-explosion-at-oxygen-cylinder-plant-what-we-know/articleshow/123134822.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mohali-blast-2-killed-three-injured-in-explosion-at-oxygen-cylinder-plant-what-we-know/articleshow/123134822.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:55:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="838179" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135225,imgsize-838179.cms"/></item><item><title>INDIA bloc to meet at Rahul's residence on Aug 7- What's on the agenda</title><description><![CDATA[Opposition INDIA bloc leaders are set to convene in Delhi on August 7 to strategize against PM Modi's alleged misinformation ahead of assembly polls. Discussions will encompass the Pahalgam attack and 'Operation Sindoor,' alongside concerns regarding Bihar's voter list revision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-bloc-meet-opposition-leaders-to-gather-at-rahul-gandhis-residence-on-august-7-whats-on-the-agenda/articleshow/123133795.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-bloc-meet-opposition-leaders-to-gather-at-rahul-gandhis-residence-on-august-7-whats-on-the-agenda/articleshow/123133795.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:41:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="922122" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134767,imgsize-922122.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL Rumours: Sanju Samson to stay! RR captain not going anywhere</title><description><![CDATA[Sanju Samson will remain with Rajasthan Royals. He will not be traded before the 2026 Indian Premier League. Recent speculation linked him to Kolkata Knight Riders and Chennai Super Kings. Rajasthan Royals have decided to retain Samson. He is an integral part of the team. Samson is also the captain. He aims for a strong performance in the upcoming season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-rumours-sanju-samson-to-stay-rajasthan-royals-captain-not-going-anywhere/articleshow/123135461.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-rumours-sanju-samson-to-stay-rajasthan-royals-captain-not-going-anywhere/articleshow/123135461.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:08:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV GUPTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88298" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135549,imgsize-88298.cms"/></item><item><title>KL Rahul melts hearts as he shares pic of daughter Evaarah holding his finger</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricketer KL Rahul shared heartwarming photos from his England break, including a touching image of his baby daughter Evaarah clutching his finger. The post, which also featured moments with his brother-in-law Ahan Shetty, quickly garnered love from fans and family. Suniel Shetty and Ranveer Singh expressed their affection, celebrating the sweet family moments of Rahul and Athiya Shetty.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/kl-rahul-melts-hearts-as-he-shares-adorable-pic-of-daughter-evaarah-holding-his-finger-athiya-shetty-suniel-shetty-ranveer-singh-react-with-love/articleshow/123134986.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/kl-rahul-melts-hearts-as-he-shares-adorable-pic-of-daughter-evaarah-holding-his-finger-athiya-shetty-suniel-shetty-ranveer-singh-react-with-love/articleshow/123134986.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:49:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43464" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134910,imgsize-43464.cms"/></item><item><title>Repo rate kept unchanged at 5.5%; what does it mean for your loan EMIs?</title><description><![CDATA[The RBI's MPC has maintained the repo rate at 5.5% in its August review, offering no immediate EMI relief for borrowers, despite previous cuts. While a 1% repo rate reduction this year hasn't fully translated to lower EMIs, expectations are for future reductions. This decision occurs amidst potential tariff hikes by the US due to India's oil trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/rbi-mpc-meet-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-says-repo-rate-kept-unchanged-at-5-5-what-does-it-mean-for-your-loan-emis/articleshow/123132431.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/rbi-mpc-meet-rbi-governor-sanjay-malhotra-says-repo-rate-kept-unchanged-at-5-5-what-does-it-mean-for-your-loan-emis/articleshow/123132431.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:24:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="82994" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132584,imgsize-82994.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand flash floods: Homes buried, roads blocked; PM Modi dials CM Dhami - latest developments</title><description><![CDATA[A devastating flash flood struck Dharali village in Uttarakhand's Uttarkashi district, triggered by a cloudburst. The deluge of water and debris flattened buildings, trapping dozens and resulting in casualties. Rescue operations are under way by army and NDRF teams, with efforts focused on clearing debris and restoring connectivity amidst challenging weather conditions. PM Modi assured full central support to CM Dhami.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-flash-floods-homes-buried-roads-blocked-pm-modi-speaks-to-cm-dhami-latest-developments/articleshow/123132377.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-flash-floods-homes-buried-roads-blocked-pm-modi-speaks-to-cm-dhami-latest-developments/articleshow/123132377.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:59:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4567558" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132381,imgsize-4567558.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarkashi flash floods: Rules flouted for profit? Experts blame unchecked construction, tourism push</title><description><![CDATA[Environmentalists suggest that unchecked construction and human activity within the Bhagirathi Eco-Sensitive Zone exacerbated the recent devastating flood in Dharali village. They highlight that unregulated development disrupts natural drainage and accelerates land degradation. Experts are calling for stricter land-use regulations, comprehensive climate monitoring, and sustainable tourism practices to protect the vulnerable Himalayan ecosystem.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/unregulated-activity-added-to-dharali-devastation-experts/articleshow/123127074.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/unregulated-activity-added-to-dharali-devastation-experts/articleshow/123127074.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 00:52:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SHIVANI AZAD</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="76514" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123130928,imgsize-76514.cms"/></item><item><title>T20 History! Rashid Khan shines at Lord’s, becomes first bowler ever to ...</title><description><![CDATA[Rashid Khan marked his return to competitive cricket with a historic milestone, becoming the first player to reach 650 T20 wickets. Playing for Oval Invincibles in The Hundred 2025, he took 3/11 against London Spirit, showcasing his spin mastery. His performance, combined with Sam Curran's, led the Invincibles to a comfortable victory, starting their title defense strongly.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/t20-history-rashid-khan-shines-on-invincibles-debut-at-lords-becomes-first-bowler-ever-to-/articleshow/123134541.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/t20-history-rashid-khan-shines-on-invincibles-debut-at-lords-becomes-first-bowler-ever-to-/articleshow/123134541.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:35:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="111500" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134597,imgsize-111500.cms"/></item><item><title>'Reason he can't stand up to Trump is ...': Rahul's fresh charge at PM</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi has accused PM Modi of being unable to confront President Trump's tariff threats due to the ongoing US investigation into Adani. Gandhi alleges that Modi's silence stems from potential exposure of financial links between Modi, Adani, and Russian oil deals. The opposition has been criticizing PM Modi and the BJP government over Trump's tariff threats and penalties for business with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/reason-pm-cant-stand-up-to-trump-is-rahuls-fresh-charge-at-pm-claims-modis-hands-are-tied/articleshow/123133175.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/reason-pm-cant-stand-up-to-trump-is-rahuls-fresh-charge-at-pm-claims-modis-hands-are-tied/articleshow/123133175.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:58:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1561951" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133376,imgsize-1561951.cms"/></item><item><title>NEET UG round 1 revised counselling schedule: Key updates out- check imp dates</title><description><![CDATA[The Medical Counselling Committee (MCC) has released a revised Round 1 schedule for NEET UG 2025 counselling, following an abrupt suspension of the choice filling process. The updated timeline, issued on August 6, extends key deadlines including registration, now open until 3 PM today. The move brings clarity for medical aspirants and resumes the AIQ admission process.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/neet-ug-2025-round-1-counselling-revised-schedule-released-at-mcc-nic-in-check-important-dates-here/articleshow/123134101.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/neet-ug-2025-round-1-counselling-revised-schedule-released-at-mcc-nic-in-check-important-dates-here/articleshow/123134101.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:09:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="226592" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134088,imgsize-226592.cms"/></item><item><title>EXCLUSIVE | ‘If we are serious about 2036 bid...’ - Abhinav Bindra</title><description><![CDATA[Abhinav Bindra supports India's ambition to host the 2036 Olympic Games, emphasizing its potential to inspire a generation and drive national development. He stresses the importance of focusing on athlete development and building robust sports systems. Bindra believes that investing in athletes and grassroots participation is crucial for India to be competitive by 2036.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/exclusive-if-we-are-serious-about-2036-bid-we-must-invest-in-our-athletes-abhinav-bindra/articleshow/123134586.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/exclusive-if-we-are-serious-about-2036-bid-we-must-invest-in-our-athletes-abhinav-bindra/articleshow/123134586.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:33:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TUSHAR DUTT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="102872" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134563,imgsize-102872.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand cloudburst: Roorkee-born Pant 'deeply saddened' as devastation hits Uttarkashi</title><description><![CDATA[Following cloudbursts and continuous rainfall in Uttarakhand, cricketer Rishabh Pant expressed his concern for those affected and urged them to stay strong. The rising water level in the Ganga River prompted alerts, while Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami surveyed affected areas and initiated large-scale rescue operations involving multiple agencies to save stranded individuals amidst flooding and landslides.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/uttarakhand-cloudburst-rishabh-pant-deeply-saddened-as-devastation-hits-uttarkashi/articleshow/123135380.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/uttarakhand-cloudburst-rishabh-pant-deeply-saddened-as-devastation-hits-uttarkashi/articleshow/123135380.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 12:06:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="109692" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123135492,imgsize-109692.cms"/></item><item><title>'Means a lot': Pant wins hearts, funds college admission for a student</title><description><![CDATA[Rishabh Pant demonstrated his compassionate side by assisting Jyoti Kanaboor Math, a bright student from Karnataka, in achieving her academic aspirations. Despite scoring 83% in her Class 12 exams, Jyoti faced financial constraints that threatened her BCA enrollment. Pant's timely intervention, a Rs 40,000 donation, ensured her admission and first-semester fees were covered, earning him gratitude and admiration.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/rishabh-pant-wins-hearts-with-heartfelt-gesture-funds-college-admission-for-karnataka-student/articleshow/123133781.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/off-the-field/rishabh-pant-wins-hearts-with-heartfelt-gesture-funds-college-admission-for-karnataka-student/articleshow/123133781.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 11:06:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="67146" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134028,imgsize-67146.cms"/></item><item><title>'I never said a percentage': Trump on increasing tariffs on countries buying Russian oil</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump has threatened to impose substantial tariffs on India for continuing to purchase Russian oil, despite criticism from within his own party. Nikki Haley cautioned against harming relations with India while seemingly giving China a pass. India has defended its oil imports, citing diverted traditional supplies and pointing out that other nations also trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/i-never-said-a-percentage-trump-on-increasing-tariffs-on-countries-buying-russian-energy-nikki-haley-warns-against-hurting-india-sparing-china/articleshow/123132059.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/i-never-said-a-percentage-trump-on-increasing-tariffs-on-countries-buying-russian-energy-nikki-haley-warns-against-hurting-india-sparing-china/articleshow/123132059.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:15:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="53458" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123134344,imgsize-53458.cms"/></item><item><title>Forged resident card: Indian man arrested in New York; faces 10 years in jail</title><description><![CDATA[Swapnil Ramesh Tejale, an Indian citizen, faced arrest in the US. The arrest occurred due to possession of a fake resident card. Authorities took him into custody in Niagara Falls, New York. He faces a potential 10-year prison sentence. The arrest is part of 'Operation Take Back America'. This initiative targets illegal immigration.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/us-canada-news/forged-resident-card-indian-man-arrested-in-new-york-faces-10-years-in-jail/articleshow/123133723.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/us-canada-news/forged-resident-card-indian-man-arrested-in-new-york-faces-10-years-in-jail/articleshow/123133723.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:54:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="131552" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133752,imgsize-131552.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will call PM Modi': Brazil's Lula snubs Trump amid tariff row</title><description><![CDATA[Brazilian President Lula da Silva plans to challenge Donald Trump's 50% tariffs by contacting global leaders, including Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Xi Jinping. Despite tensions, Lula will use the WTO to defend Brazil's interests. He refuted Trump's justification for the tariffs, viewing it as an attack on Brazil's sovereignty.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-call-pm-modi-brazils-lula-snubs-trump-amid-tariff-row-rejects-offer-to-reach-out/articleshow/123132286.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-call-pm-modi-brazils-lula-snubs-trump-amid-tariff-row-rejects-offer-to-reach-out/articleshow/123132286.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:50:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="854478" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132369,imgsize-854478.cms"/></item><item><title>Visa delays strand students: Thousands stuck abroad; US colleges face financial hit</title><description><![CDATA[Thousands of international students remain stranded as US visa delays under the Trump administration disrupt fall enrollments, threatening billions in tuition revenue. Universities like Arizona State and Furman report significant shortfalls, while students face rejections and lack of appointments. Institutions scramble with backup plans abroad, as America’s higher education appeal faces serious global erosion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/visa-delays-leave-thousands-of-international-students-stranded-us-colleges-face-major-financial-hit/articleshow/123133001.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/visa-delays-leave-thousands-of-international-students-stranded-us-colleges-face-major-financial-hit/articleshow/123133001.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:19:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39268" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133084,imgsize-39268.cms"/></item><item><title>TN MP chain snatching case solved: Accused nabbed in Delhi; scooter hunt leads to arrest</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi Police successfully solved the chain snatching case involving Tamil Nadu MP R Sudha near the Poland Embassy in Chanakyapuri. The accused was apprehended, and the stolen gold chain, weighing over four sovereigns, was recovered. Police traced the suspect using CCTV footage, identifying a blue scooter used in the crime, leading to the arrest in connection with the high-profile incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/tamil-nadu-mp-chain-snatching-case-solved-accused-nabbed-in-delhi-ornament-recovered/articleshow/123132992.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/tamil-nadu-mp-chain-snatching-case-solved-accused-nabbed-in-delhi-ornament-recovered/articleshow/123132992.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:17:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ABHAY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1722448" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132987,imgsize-1722448.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Mohammed Siraj conquers snubs, trolls and misfortune</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj’s fiery spirit defined India’s drawn Test series in England. Overlooked, misjudged, and trolled, he rose through relentless spells, emotional resilience, and raw hunger. From rubber slippers in Toli Chowki to nine SENA wins, Siraj’s journey is a testament to belief. At The Oval, he didn’t just take wickets — he emerged from Bumrah’s shadow.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-mohammed-siraj-conquers-snubs-trolls-and-misfortune/articleshow/123133478.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-mohammed-siraj-conquers-snubs-trolls-and-misfortune/articleshow/123133478.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:42:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NITIN NAIK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="80474" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133508,imgsize-80474.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Transition is over! Gill & Gambhir deliver powerful statement</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill and Gautam Gambhir's coach-captain partnership has started strongly, drawing a challenging five-Test series in England. Gill's leadership and Gambhir's focus on team over individuals have instilled confidence in a young Indian side. With senior players retiring and Bumrah's availability managed carefully, the team is looking ahead, potentially revisiting ODI leadership with Gill as a key figure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-the-transition-is-over-shubman-gill-and-gautam-gambhir-deliver-a-powerful-statement-at-the-oval/articleshow/123133053.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-the-transition-is-over-shubman-gill-and-gautam-gambhir-deliver-a-powerful-statement-at-the-oval/articleshow/123133053.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:20:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARANI BASU</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="151790" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133114,imgsize-151790.cms"/></item><item><title>NSA Doval in Russia amid Trump tariff threat: Key talks with Kremlin; will oil be on agenda?</title><description><![CDATA[Ajit Doval's Moscow visit centers on strengthening the strategic partnership, defense, and security cooperation between India and Russia amid evolving geopolitical dynamics. Discussions will encompass defense collaboration and Russian oil supplies to India. The visit occurs against the backdrop of US trade threats and criticism regarding India's energy imports from Russia, which India defends as safeguarding its national interests.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nsa-ajit-doval-in-russia-amid-trump-tariff-threat-key-talks-with-kremlin-will-oil-be-on-agenda/articleshow/123131692.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nsa-ajit-doval-in-russia-amid-trump-tariff-threat-key-talks-with-kremlin-will-oil-be-on-agenda/articleshow/123131692.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:11:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="741625" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131713,imgsize-741625.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Siraj arrives in India after stellar England series, fans hail ‘Miyan Magic’</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj, the Indian pace sensation, returned to India after a stellar performance in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, where he emerged as the leading wicket-taker with 23 scalps. His crucial spells, including a six-wicket haul at Birmingham and a five-wicket spell at The Oval, solidified his role as a key figure in India's pace attack, especially with Bumrah's absence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-mohammed-siraj-arrives-in-mumbai-after-stellar-england-series-fans-hail-miyan-magic/articleshow/123132951.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-mohammed-siraj-arrives-in-mumbai-after-stellar-england-series-fans-hail-miyan-magic/articleshow/123132951.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 10:19:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12458" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123133085,imgsize-12458.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand cloudburst: Rain alert forces school closures across four districts</title><description><![CDATA[Uttarakhand authorities have shut all schools and Anganwadi centres in Almora, Pithoragarh, Chamoli, and Rudraprayag districts following an IMD warning of heavy rainfall. The move aims to protect students amid flash flood and landslide risks. Haridwar faces waterlogging, while a boulder on the Haridwar-Dehradun rail route has disrupted train services, prompting high alert across the state.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/rain-alert-forces-school-closures-across-four-uttarakhand-districts-check-details-here/articleshow/123131523.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/rain-alert-forces-school-closures-across-four-uttarakhand-districts-check-details-here/articleshow/123131523.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:35:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2003258" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131552,imgsize-2003258.cms"/></item><item><title>'Death to Trump': Bengaluru man in Scotland court for threat to bomb easyJet flight</title><description><![CDATA[Abhay Devdas Nayak, a Bengaluru resident, faced court in Scotland. He is accused of threatening to bomb an easyJet flight. Nayak allegedly shouted "Allahu Akbar" during the incident. Passengers were terrified on the Luton to Glasgow flight. He reportedly made threats against America and former President Trump. Nayak is remanded in custody. Bengaluru police have limited information about Nayak.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/bengaluru-man-appears-in-scotland-court-for-easyjet-flight-bomb-threat/articleshow/123125917.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/bengaluru-man-appears-in-scotland-court-for-easyjet-flight-bomb-threat/articleshow/123125917.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 23:50:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NAOMI CANTON</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="547100" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132633,imgsize-547100.cms"/></item><item><title>Stock market: Nifty50, BSE Sensex trade lower after RBI keeps repo rate unchanged</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market today: Indian equity benchmark indices, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, opened in flat in trade on Wednesday ahead of the RBI monetary policy review decision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-06-2025-rbi-monetary-policy-mpc-donald-trump-tariffs-india-impact-global-markets/articleshow/123131457.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-06-2025-rbi-monetary-policy-mpc-donald-trump-tariffs-india-impact-global-markets/articleshow/123131457.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:19:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="93070" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131489,imgsize-93070.cms"/></item><item><title>Mukesh Khanna defends SRK's National Award win</title><description><![CDATA[The entertainment industry celebrated the National Awards, but Shah Rukh Khan's first win sparked debate. South actress Urvashi questioned the fairness, while Mukesh Khanna defended SRK, highlighting his decades of hard work. Khan expressed gratitude, viewing the award as a reminder of his responsibility to cinema and a motivation to continue striving.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/mukesh-khanna-defends-shah-rukh-khans-national-award-win-he-has-been-working-hard-for-the-past-40-years-now-/articleshow/123131068.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/mukesh-khanna-defends-shah-rukh-khans-national-award-win-he-has-been-working-hard-for-the-past-40-years-now-/articleshow/123131068.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:03:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131101,imgsize-44154.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Bhag, bhag!’: Man defies death, crawls out of debris as flash flood flattens Uttarkashi village - watch</title><description><![CDATA[A man miraculously survived a flash flood in Uttarkashi's Dharali village on Tuesday. Dramatic videos show him crawling from the debris after the deluge destroyed homes and roads. Though injured and covered in mud, he managed to escape the immediate danger. His identity and condition remain unknown, and it's unconfirmed if he received medical attention.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/bhag-bhag-man-miraculously-defies-death-crawls-out-of-debris-as-uttarakhand-flash-flood-flattens-village-kheer-gad-torrent-caught-on-camera/articleshow/123130783.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/bhag-bhag-man-miraculously-defies-death-crawls-out-of-debris-as-uttarakhand-flash-flood-flattens-village-kheer-gad-torrent-caught-on-camera/articleshow/123130783.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 07:23:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV TALWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3687762" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123130921,imgsize-3687762.cms"/></item><item><title>'Languishes in premature retirement': Tharoor reignites call for Kohli's Test comeback</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor has stirred debate by questioning Virat Kohli's Test retirement, deeming it premature after India's drawn series in England. He contrasted Kohli's situation with Joe Root's continued excellence, emphasising Kohli's potential impact on the recent series. Tharoor's appeal highlights Kohli's past success and leadership, igniting calls for his return to Test cricket.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/languishes-in-premature-retirement-shashi-tharoor-reignites-call-for-virat-kohlis-test-comeback/articleshow/123131811.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/languishes-in-premature-retirement-shashi-tharoor-reignites-call-for-virat-kohlis-test-comeback/articleshow/123131811.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 08:57:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29176" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123131838,imgsize-29176.cms"/></item><item><title>Bird slams into plane: Cabin filled with smoke mid-air on Paris flight— watch</title><description><![CDATA[A Paris-bound plane from Madrid was compelled to make an emergency landing shortly after takeoff due to a bird strike, causing panic among passengers. The collision severely damaged the plane's nose, leading to smoke in the cabin and the deployment of oxygen masks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/bird-slams-into-plane-nose-cabin-filled-with-smoke-mid-air-panic-on-paris-bound-flight-watch/articleshow/123132108.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/bird-slams-into-plane-nose-cabin-filled-with-smoke-mid-air-panic-on-paris-bound-flight-watch/articleshow/123132108.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 09:52:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4469238" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123132520,imgsize-4469238.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Rainbow Children’s Medicare retains 18-20% revenue growth guidance for FY26]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/rainbow-childrens-medicare-fy26-revenue-guidance-q1-earnings-19644581.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Rainbow Children’s Medicare is maintaining its FY26 revenue growth guidance of 18–20% despite a seasonal dip in occupancy. CMD Dr. Ramesh Kancharla said the company remains optimistic as demand picks up in the coming quarters. While surgical revenue rose 15%, margins are expected to moderate to 24–25% (pre-Ind AS) due to new hospital additions. Average revenue per patient is projected to grow 6% year-on-year.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[Thousands of retired govt staff can get extra UPS payouts: What Finance Ministry said]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/finance/over-25000-retired-central-staff-eligible-for-extra-benefits-under-ups-says-fm-pension-19644621.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Under the UPS, retired employees get a structured pension payout based on their years of service. Those who have served 25 years or more receive 50% of their last 12 months’ average basic salary as pension.]]></description>
